Activity: Wake up, listen to a podcast on alternative investment strategies.
Arrive at the office. Prioritize urgent emails and tasks. Review progress on key milestones.
Approve the fund's investment strategy document after receiving final sign-off from the quantitative research team and legal counsel.
Meet with @COO-1 and @Facc-1, @Facc-2 (Fund Accountants) to discuss fund accounting procedures and reporting requirements. Ensure the accounting team is prepared for the fund's launch.

Meet with @larch-1, @sdev-1, @sdev-2, and @devops-1 (DevOps Engineer) to discuss the infrastructure requirements for the chosen trading platform and data providers. Plan for the integration process and address any potential technical challenges.
Further discuss the trading platform selection after vendors' presentation with the team and determine the criteria to be used for a final decision.
Lunch Break. Discuss market trends with colleagues.
Interview potential data providers. Evaluate their data quality, coverage, and delivery methods. Negotiate pricing and contract terms.
Email @Legal-1: Topic: Data Provider Agreements. Forward draft data provider agreements to legal counsel for review and approval.
Dedicate time to research on potential competitor arbitrage funds. Identify their strategies and key advantages.
Refine the risk management framework based on feedback from the quantitative research team and compliance officer. Incorporate specific risk limits and monitoring procedures.
Leave the office. Attend an industry networking event.
